text: Hytale is an upcoming sandbox video game by Hypixel Studios. Creation of the game began in 2015 by Minecraft server Hypixel developers with help from Riot Games. Hypixel plans to be release Hytale for PC, consoles, and mobile devices as early as 2023. title: Hytale
